data.name: Trails of Illusion
data.detailed_description:
Introduction

This is a JRPG free fangame for Falcom Kiseki series , which has turn-based combat mode. (UI asset and some model are from: Falcom, 《The Legend of Heros: Trails of The Cold Steel》 2-4)

Players can set Orbment and arts to improve characters' abilities.With special crafts for characters and various effect for equips,you can challenge many strong monsters ,and experice Producer-Created custom story on Zemuria land.
This project will only be released on Steam and will never be used for commercial purpose.If anybody buy this project on other platforms, please connect that platform and project producer please。

＊＊In System panel,you can change text into other languages(Only Chinese and Japanese for now).

Essentials

For new playes , there are no much playing guide. For Kiseki fans,this project is already implemented Septium-based Arts system, no Connection or Burst system。System development is like 《The Legend of Heros: Trails in the Sky》。This project is mainly focused on custom story and combat.

Orbment

Orbment system like《The Legend of Heros: Trails of The Sky》is implemented .You can set orbment ,calculate septium in each line and generate arts。

Combat

Combat system like《The Legend of Heros: Trails of The Sky》is implemented，which contains craft ,arts and S-craft。There are no Connection or Burst system。Characters' abilities in combat are mainly improved by buff.



Custom Story

This story on Zemuria land is created by producer，which is to explore new possibility in Kiseki world。


Various Subquest

Various subquest like book colloection，question answering and wanted monsters are already implemented. Once reaching max AP rank,you can enter cerain scene , challenge Boss and get special equip。


Controll and Frame

For keyboard and mouse controll are not optimized,playing with DS4/Xbox controller is recommended。

Configuration and Frame
intel i5-8300h + GTX 1050 4G + RAM 8G(3-4G used)
(1080P) Outdoors 10-15fps Indoors 25-30fps
(900P) Outdoors 15-20fps Indoors 35-45fps
(720P) Outdoors 20-30fps Indoors 50-60fps

intel i5-10400f + GTX 1060 6G + RAM 8G (3-4G used)
(1080P) Outdoors 15-25fps Indoors 30-35fps
(900P) Outdoors 30-40fps Indoors 60fps
(720P) Outdoors 50-60fps Indoors 60fps

intel i7-8700k + GTX 1080 8G + RAM 16G (3-4G used)
(1080P) Outdoors 25-35fps Indoors 50-60fps
(900P) Outdoors 50-60fps Indoors 60fps
(720P) Outdoors 60fps Indoors 60fps

Controll （Xbox controller is like DS4）：
Can be find in Game manual and Help panel in Game.

data.short_description: This is a JRPG free fangame for Falcom Kiseki series。Players can challenge many strong monsters ,and experice Producer-Created custom story on Zemuria land.Staff：Programmer/Game Designer： WayneScript：小洛 , Wayne

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10,Win 7
  • Processor: i5 8300h
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For keyboard and mouse controll are not optimized,playing with DS4/Xbox controller is recommended。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10,Win 7
  • Processor: i7 8700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For keyboard and mouse controll are not optimized,playing with DS4/Xbox controller is recommended。

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
